about_the_game:
Greenfeet Haven is a 2D top-down colony sim where you guide halflings in a fantasy world. Start with nothing, launch expeditions into the wilds, experiment with crafting to uncover new items, and transform your settlement into a thriving, self-sufficient village!

From Survival to Prosperity

Follow the evolution of your settlement over the years, from a few rocks to a small rural village, and eventually to the beginnings of a modern town.

  • A few twigs will be enough to lay the foundation for your budding village. After a few nights under the stars, your villagers can finally enjoy the comfort of a roof and the warmth of a good soup.

  • Protect your inhabitants from dangers: wild animals, bandits, and legendary creatures will not hesitate to visit your village.

  • Go through periods of famine and lay the groundwork for a modern civilized life, where everyone can enjoy the luxury of a warm home, a family, a good meal, and leisure activities!

Explore and Progress

There is a lot to discover in Greenfeet Haven. Your initial survivors may only be capable of lighting a fire. Guide them and unlock various knowledge, such as pottery or chemistry.

  • Unlock new items and structures as the game progresses. Each new element added to your village reveals new ideas to explore.

  • Attract dwarves and elves to assist you. If they are satisfied with their stay, they may be willing to share their secrets with you.

  • Improve the lives of your villagers through science or the arcane arts of magic. Or perhaps both?

Organize Your Society

Whether your villagers live together in a dormitory or are spread out in households, Greenfeet Haven adapts to your desires with the zone system!

  • Design dormitories, houses, workshops, and taverns with just a few clicks using the zone and unified schedule system.

  • Keep your best cooks at the stoves and your finest potter behind the workbench. Talent specialization is the key!

  • Some equipment, like ovens, takes time to heat up. Form a night team, and the oven will remain fueled continuously.

Made With Heart

Greenfeet Haven is a heartfelt game made with passion by a single developer, for passionate players. I hope it brings you many hours of enjoyment!

content_descriptors.notes: Greenfeet Haven contains 2D pixelated representation of death, blood and violence. The villagers can brew and drink alcohol and it is required at some point to progress through the game. Greenfeet Haven also contains 2D pixelated occasional representation of nudity with villagers being able to be shirtless, including women.
